summary: A simple, basic spellsword follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first follower mod...

Jakar Deseric is a high-level Breton Spellsword. He is extremely proficient in One-Handed Combat as well as all schools of magic. He can be found camping outside Shor's Stone. Sorry, no custom voice for this follower, he was created first and foremost as an initial test to see if I could successfully insert my own follower into the game.

[s][b][color=#ffff00]This mod requires [/color][/b][b][color=#ffff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Aber[/url] by Aberin otherwise your game [i]WILL[/i] crash on loading! None of the official DLCs are required.

[/color][/b][/s][b]Update: I obtained permission from Aberin to use the assets from Eyes of Aber directly within this mod, so it no longer requires the Eyes of Aber mod in the updated version![/b]

I also recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35002/?]Opulent Outfits[/url] by babooncru. Not only will his outfit look the way it does in the screenshots, but all College of Winterhold robes look AMAZING with that retexture!

Other Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps for Men[/url] by Geonox
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better Males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url] by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD textures[/url] by skyrimaguas

Credits:
Bethesda for TES: Skyrim and Creation Kit
Aberin for The Eyes of Aber
babooncru for Opulent Outfits
All the various tutorials on how to add a follower.

Permissions:
This mod is provided as-is and the upload to other sites or modification of it's assets is not authorized without obtaining my permission first.
author: k4tonic
